author: Kahlil Gibran
message: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
title: Thought of the day

author: Oscar Wilde
message: Anybody can make history. Only a great man can write it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Hermann Hesse
message: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: Allow the world to live as it chooses, and allow yourself to live as you choose.
title: Thought of the day
